  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1634</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Music & Internet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musik U. Internet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Musique et Internet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Música & Internet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Musica & Internet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μουσική & Διαδίκτυο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Música Y Internet</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A computer skills-based lesson where the pupils need to use the nternet in order to find a song that they like and then use vocabuary to describe their feelings.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning english</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">english efl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">music</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">internet</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Computer Fähigkeit-gründete Lektion, in der 
die Schüler das nternet benutzen müssen, um ein Lied zu finden, dem 
sie und dann vocabuary pflegen ihre Gefühle beschreiben mögen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un ordinateur compétence-a basé la leçon où 
les élèves doivent employer le nternet afin de trouver une chanson 
qu'ils aiment et puis les utilisent vocabuary pour décrire leurs 
sentiments.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um computador habilidade-baseou a lição onde os 
alunos necessitam usar o nternet a fim encontrar uma canção que 
gostem e se usem então vocabuary de descrever de seus sentimentos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un calcolatore abilità-ha basato la lezione dove 
gli allievi devono usare il nternet per trovare una canzone che 
gradiscono ed allora usano vocabuary per descrivere le loro 
sensibilità.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα ικανότητα-βασισμένο στον υπολογιστή μάθημα όπου 
οι μαθητές πρέπει να χρησιμοποιήσουν το nternet προκειμένου να 
βρεθεί ένα τραγούδι ότι επιθυμούν και χρησιμοποιούν έπειτα 
vocabuary για να περιγράψουν τα συναισθήματά τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un ordenador habilidad-baso' la lección donde las
pupilas necesitan utilizar el nternet para encontrar una canción que 
tengan gusto y después las utilicen vocabuary para describir de sus 
sensaciones.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erlernenenglisch</string>
